meanings.definition: The leading character or one of the major characters in a drama, movie, novel, or other fictional text.
meanings.sent1: In the story, the protagonists worked together to solve the mystery.
meanings.sent2: The protagonists in the movie had to overcome many challenges to reach their goal.
meanings.sent3: The protagonists' determination to succeed made the audience root for them.
meanings.sent4: Just like the protagonists in a story, we all face obstacles that we must overcome.
meanings.sent5: The protagonists' bravery and courage inspired others to follow their lead.

meanings.definition: A supporter or advocate of a particular cause or idea.
meanings.sent1: As a protagonist of environmental conservation, she actively participated in clean-up campaigns.
meanings.sent2: The protagonists of the charity event raised awareness for their cause through social media.
meanings.sent3: The protagonists of the fundraiser organized a fun run to gather support for their cause.
meanings.sent4: She was a true protagonist of equality, always standing up for what she believed in.
meanings.sent5: The protagonists of the movement united people from all walks of life for a common purpose.
